hero.title: Professional Live Music Performances

acoustic_performances.name: Acoustic Performances
acoustic_performances.description: Intimate acoustic guitar sessions perfect for creating atmosphere without overwhelming conversation. Ideal for restaurants, cafés, weddings, and private events where music enhances the experience.

pricing.note: Pricing varies by event type, duration, and location. Contact for detailed quote.

venue_performances.name: Regular Venue Performances
venue_performances.description: Regular live music performances for restaurants, bars, clubs, and private venues. From intimate acoustic sessions to energetic blues sets, I create the perfect atmosphere for your establishment and patrons.

portfolio.bandDescription: High-energy electric blues and rock performances featuring dynamic guitar work and stage presence. Perfect for venues looking to create an exciting atmosphere with crowd-engaging music that gets people moving and creates memorable nights out.
portfolio.soloDescription: Intimate acoustic performances showcasing musical versatility and connection with the audience. Ideal for cafés, restaurants, weddings, and private events where a more personal musical experience enhances the atmosphere without overwhelming conversation.

experience.note: Experience metrics like years active, total performances, venue counts, and geographic reach are now calculated dynamically. See src/utils/performanceCalculator.ts
highlights: Excellent client feedback and repeat bookings

testimonials.note: Performance testimonials are now managed centrally in testimonials.json with service='performance'. This provides consistent data and automatic statistics calculation.

featured.text: Rrish made our wedding ceremony absolutely magical. His acoustic performance during the ceremony was beautiful and his energy during the reception had everyone dancing. Professional, talented, and such a lovely person to work with.
featured.author: Sarah & Michael
